article: If you want to learn a new language,the very first thing to think about is why.Do you need it for a  _  reason,such as your job or your studies?  _  perhaps you're interested in the  _  ,films or music of a different country and you know how much it will help to have a  _  of the language. Many people start learning a language and soon give up."I'm too  _  ," they say.Yes,children do learn languages more  _  than adults,but research has shown that you can learn a language at any  _  .And learning is good for the health of your brain,too.I've also heard people  _  about the mistakes they make when  _  .Well,relax and laugh about your mistakes  _  you're much less likely to make them again.
